about_the_game:
Discover the tragic events of a doctor who faces an existential crisis in a small, remote seaside town.
The story begins with a noblewoman who visits this doctor's clinic.
A disease that spreads relentlessly, a frenzy... Everyone you see, meet, greet may suddenly become your enemy.
And in the midst of all this danger, a quest, a desperate pursuit...


  • You will experience the intense action through Amok's exciting fighting sequences. Don't hesitate to use your gun to stay alive!
  • Drive around the streets of the Riverside town in a variety of vehicles in an open world setting. Experience the interactive, fascinating and equally gloomy atmosphere!
  • Solve mysterious puzzles, use your mind to overcome the obstacles one by one!
  • Unlock the secrets of this extraordinary and rich story by collecting and reading the notes scattered around!
  • In addition to the great main story; rich, unique and exciting side missions await you!
  • Do you enjoy fighting against a wave of enemies approaching in dozens? Then "Till death" mode is just for you!

A LOVE STORY

The disease is spreading more and more each day. While townsfolk are desperately leaving the town in the face of this insanity, the doctor is in pursuit of an obsessive love.

A CRUEL DISEASE

They run incredibly fast towards every living thing they see, with all of their energy. They attack all things that move; human or animal, it doesn't matter. The name of this disease and insanity is AMOK.

ABOUT THE STORY

Meet Stefan Zweig, one of the most famous authors of his time. Through Amok Runner, experience his fascinating and rich world which is full of surprises.

DLSS and FIDELITY FX SUPPORT

Amok Runner supports NVIDIA® DLSS and AMD FidelityFX™ technologies that enable gorgeous, high-quality sharp images without sacrificing frame rates.

CONTROLS

A wide variety of game controllers are supported, as well as fully customizable keyboard keys and adjustable mouse sensitivity.

VISUALS

With widescreen, HDR and 4K resolution support, you can get high-quality visuals and change all the settings individually.

content_descriptors.notes: Samples of short-term blood splatters may be shown during combats, the characters may have their limbs cut off and use obscene, swear words during some scenes. You can activate or deactivate all these adult content settings directly from the game's menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended for faster loading times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5700-XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended for faster loading times

short_description: One day, a noble woman turns our protagonist's (the doctor) life upside down by visiting his clinic, in a town where the amok madness is rampant. The doctor leaves all his personal effects and career aside and begins to follow this woman's footsteps while fighting against the deadly amok syndrome.
